name: PANA Multi Media
overview: At PANA Multi Media our mantra is that anything “is” possible. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, we specialize in dynamic and creative large format print/web media solutions. We’re a dedicated and multi-disciplinary agency with over 9 years of experience in the marketing industry. We focus on providing visually creative platforms that enable our clients to showcase their business message effectively and clearly. We believe that the best way to achieve progressive results for our clients is to surround ourselves with the most creative people we can find. This is why we’ve teamed up with the top innovative leaders in the industry when it comes to fabrication and design. But what does this mean to our clients? It means we can pretty much do anything you visualize for your large format print, tradeshow/event display stands, environmental graphics and website development projects. We will be with you every step of the way, focusing on a TRUE “one-on-one” approach during the course of your project.
